thread.title: David Beckham shares sweet birthday message for 'cheeky' Cruz
thread.title_full: David Beckham shares sweet birthday message for 'cheeky' Cruz

title: David Beckham shares sweet birthday message for 'cheeky' Cruz
text:
David Beckham shares sweet birthday message for Cruz: 'The cheekiest member of our family' February 20, 2017 by Gemma Strong David Beckham and Victoria Beckham share sweet birthday messages for son Cruz Beckham: 'The cheekiest member of our family' Leave a comment 
David Beckham and Victoria Beckham shone the spotlight on their youngest son Cruz on Sunday in celebration of his 12th birthday. Proud dad David shared a sweet tribute to the birthday boy on Instagram alongside a candid photo of the pair together at the beach. "Happy birthday to the cheekiest member of our family," David, 41, wrote. "He may be the cheekiest but this little man has the biggest heart and sweetest nature, and any dad would be proud to have that in his son." 
The former footballer added: "At 12 years old he brings a smile and joy into the house from the moment he opens his eyes til the moment he falls asleep which normal means 8:30pm (but we all know that means 9:30 right CRUZ). Anyway, Happy Birthday little man. x love you." Of course David wasn't the only family member sharing a birthday message for Cruz. Mum Victoria also took to Instagram to celebrate her son's special day. 
VIEW GALLERY David Beckham shared a birthday message for youngest son Cruz on Instagram 
The fashion designer, 42, shared a close-up snapshot of her son, looking smart in a shirt and tie and posing in front of blue and silver balloons. "Happy birthday beautiful boy x," she wrote. "We are all so proud and love u so much. Can't believe you are 12 years old today!!! Lots of love and kisses x." It's been a busy week of celebrations for the Beckhams. Just one day earlier, David's sister Joanne marked her birthday, and David shared a touching Instagram post for his younger sibling. 
VIEW GALLERY He also shared a throwback photo in celebration of sister Joanne's birthday 
The star posted a vintage photograph showing him and Joanne holding hands and dancing together as children. He wrote: "Happy birthday Jo… To the most amazing person, sister and daughter anyone could want… Have the most amazing day because you deserve all the luck and love in the world. ❤ @joannebeckham p.s not sure about my dancing moves or my mum and dads carpet…"
